definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity

sentences.english: The act expressly provides for injunctive relief.
sentences.chinese: 刑事救济规定对受害人进行充分补偿。

sentences.english: The gunman notched up five victims on the handle of his gun.
sentences.chinese: 枪手在自己的枪柄上刻上5个受害者的记号。

sentences.english: Many prisoners were tortured and were victims of gruesome medical experiments.
sentences.chinese: 许多囚犯惨遭蹂躏，成为了可怕的医学实验的受害者。

sentences.english: Europe and Asia are also suffering through financial turmoil, McCormick said. (See “World Markets Remain Hesitant Following Financial Rescue Plan.”)
sentences.chinese: 麦考密克说，欧洲与亚洲也因金融动荡受害。

sentences.english: The young who break the law & commit a crime are both vermin & victims .
sentences.chinese: 违法犯罪的青少年既是害人者，又是受害者。

sentences.english: Some local businessmen proposed to raise a comfort fund for the earthquake victims.
sentences.chinese: 当地一些商人提议向地震受害者筹集抚恤金。

sentences.english: Researchers suspect that most such victims were suffocated to death.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员猜测大部分受害者为窒息而死。

sentences.english: She published a book listing 659 names;
sentences.chinese: 她出版的一本书，就列出了659名受害者。

sentences.english: The victim was hit by a hail of bullets.
sentences.chinese: 受害者被一阵弹雨击中。

sentences.english: The casuingties said Lord Saville were the victims of unjustified firing by the soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 伤亡者是由士兵无情扫射的受害者。

sentences.english: They are almost always able to sneak up on their unprepared victims twinkle-toed.
sentences.chinese: 他们几乎总是能够偷袭了他们的准备受害者闪烁趾。

sentences.english: She was a typical victim of harassments, libel and sex abuse .
sentences.chinese: 她是这个折磨，诽谤和性骚扰的一个典型的受害者。

sentences.english: The killings are brutal, with victims ritually tortured.
sentences.chinese: 受害者通常在遭受仪式性的折磨之后被残酷杀害。

sentences.english: If you like, you can also dismember them.
sentences.chinese: 如果玩者乐意的话，还可以肢解受害者的尸体。

sentences.english: China also falls victim to hacker attacks.
sentences.chinese: 中国也是黑客攻击的受害者。

sentences.english: VICTIM】They were the victims of a dishonest merchant.
sentences.chinese: 他们是一个奸商的受害者。

definition: to be cheated/to be taken in/to be hoodwinked
to report a case to the authorities
